SEARCH
Package Database

Class db

java.lang.Object
Database.db
public final class db extends Object
Thin DB utility - JDBC helpers and typed row DTOs. Straightforward, static-only. Reads config from env/.env, exposes simple query/insert/update methods.
Author:
Akil Daresalamwala

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static final class 
    db.CurrentItemRow
    Row for current_items view: id, item id/name, optional custom cost/note.
    static final class 
    db.EmployeeRow
    Row for employees table: id, name, manager flag.
    static final class 
    db.ItemRow
    Row for items table: id, name, category, cost, stock, active.
    static final class 
    db.PastItemRow
    Row for past_items table: order linkage, custom cost/note, timestamp.
    static final class 
    db.PastRestockRow
    Row for past_restocks table: ids, item/modification, quantities and dates.
    static final class 
    db.SuggestedRestockRow
    Row for suggested_restocks table: id, linkage, recommended qty/date, and cost.
    static final class 
    db.ZTotals
    Z-report totals container: line count and gross revenue.
